short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Quickly delete/wipe your browser Cookies for a defined period with one click!
short.de: Löschen Sie Ihre Browser-Cookies für einen bestimmten Zeitraum mit einem Klick!
short.es: Elimine rápidamente las cookies de su navegador durante un período definido con un solo clic.
short.fr: Supprimez rapidement les cookies de votre navigateur pour une période définie en un seul clic !
short.it: Elimina rapidamente i cookie del tuo browser per un periodo definito con un solo clic!
short.ja: 決められた期間のブラウザのCookieをワンクリックで素早く削除できます。
short.nl: Verwijder snel uw browsercookies voor een bepaalde periode met één klik!
short.pt_BR: Apague rapidamente seus cookies de seu navegador por um período definido com um clique!
short.pt_PT: Apague rapidamente os Cookies do seu navegador durante um período definido com um clique!
short.ru: Быстрое удаление Cookies браузера за определенный период одним щелчком мыши!
short.zh_CN: 只需点击一下，就能快速删除规定时间内的浏览器Cookies!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
"Cookie Cleaner" offers a user-friendly solution for clearing your browser's stored cookies within a specific timeframe. You can set a personalized period for the cleanup by accessing the options page. Additionally, you can select the specific area or zone where you want the data to be wiped.

For a more thorough cleaning experience, I recommend trying out my "eCleaner" extension, available at:
https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/ecleaner-forget-button/ejhlpopncnfaaeicmbdnddebccnkfenn

You can erase cookies from three distinct zones:
1. Regular websites,
2. Protected websites,
3. Extension zone

To clarify the definitions of these zones:
- Extensions zone includes extensions and packaged applications that a user has installed.
- Protected websites zone covers websites installed as hosted applications.

For any bug reports, kindly visit:
https://github.com/andy-portmen/ecleaner

There are two operation modes available:
1. In the first mode, the cleaning interface opens with each action click. You can set the cleaning period, or use presets before proceeding.
2. The second mode operates in a headless without a visible interface. The action button turns red during the operation.

Customization is possible by defining a keyboard shortcut for the extension, allowing you to use the headless mode for silent and distraction-free cookie cleaning.
long.de,es,fr,it,ja,nl,pt_BR,pt_PT,ru,zh_CN:
"Cookie Cleaner" is the easiest way to clear your browser stored cookies for a specified period. You can define a custom period on the options page. Also, you can define the area (zone) in which you want the data to be cleared.

For a more comprehensive cleaner try my eCleaner
https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/ecleaner-forget-button/ejhlpopncnfaaeicmbdnddebccnkfenn

Using this extension it is possible to wipe cookies of three different zones:
1. Normal websites,
2. Protected websites,
3. Extension zone

Definitions:
  -> Extensions zone: Extensions and packaged applications a user has installed
  -> Protected websites zone: Websites that have been installed as hosted applications

For bug reports please visit:
https://github.com/andy-portmen/ecleaner

For FAQs please visit:
https://add0n.com/ecleaner.html?from=cookie-cleaner
